scheme_name: One-Time Grant Money To Soldiers Conferred With Gallantry Medal Award
brief_description: "One-Time Grant Money To Soldiers Conferred With Gallantry Medal Award" is a social security scheme that provides financial assistance to serving soldiers, and former soldiers of the state who have been conferred with the "Gallantry Medal Award".
detailed_description: "One-Time Grant Money To Soldiers Conferred With Gallantry Medal Award" scheme is a social security scheme by the State Sainik Board, Government of Uttarakhand. Under this scheme, a one-time grant is admissible to serving soldiers, former soldiers of the state who have been conferred with the "Gallantry Medal Award".
benefits: A one time grant of maximum of ₹50,00,000/- and minimum ₹4,00,000/- is given Annually a maximum of 4,00,000/- and a minimum of ₹40,000/- is given.
eligibility_criteria: The applicant should be a serving soldier or a former soldier. The soldier should be conferred with the "Gallantry Medal Award".

steps: Registration Process: Step 1: Visit Apuni Sarkar and click on the "Sign Up Here" button. Step 2: Fill the required details i.e. Email ID, Gender, Name, Mobile Number, Date Of Birth, District, Tehsil, Address of Applicant, Notifications Language Preference. Step 3: Click on "Submit".  Post-Registration Process: Step 1: Visit Apuni Sarkar portal. Step 2: In "Citizen Login" window enter your phone number/mail id, correct password and captcha code. Step 3: Click on "Sign In" button. Step 4: From the left side menu button click on "DBT Services" then choose "Soldier Welfare Department".

Step 5: Now click on the scheme "One time Cash Grant/Annuity to Soldiers of State for War Service/Gallantry Medal (Sarvottam Yudh Seva Medal, Uttam Yudh Seva Medal, Yudh Seva Medal, Sena Medal (Gallantry), Mention-in-Dispatch)".

Step 6: Enter the mobile number and verify with the OTP. Step 7: Click on the checkbox for WhatsApp Verification (for receiving updates regarding your application via WhatsApp). Step 8: Now upload all the mandatory documents and click on "Submit".
Step 8: The application can be tracked from the "Profile" section.

Step 1: Prescribed format can be collected from the nearest District Sainik Welfare Office. Step 2: Fill the form properly and attach all the documents (attested,if required). Step 3: Submit the form at the District Sainik Welfare Office.

documents_required: Photocopy of the applicant's Aadhaar card. PAN card. Bank Passbook and Cancelled Cheque. Identity card of the dependent (if the applicant is a dependent). Domicile certificate of Uttarakhand. Photocopy of the gazette notification regarding the award of the Gallantry Medal. Affidavit ( on stamp paper of ₹ 10 ) to the effect that the one-time grant/annual grant money for the Gallantry Medal Award has not been received from any other state earlier and will not be received in the future. Photocopy of the discharge book (if the applicant is a veteran).
